EmailTemplate.description: Looking to upgrade your ATMs? We have the answer Upgrade your ATM fleet and reduce the burden with ATM as a Service https://www.ncr.com/banking/atm-as-a-service
EmailTemplate.name: 09-13-22 BNK SelfServ 21 SEA Email 4.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Looking to upgrade your ATMs? We have the answer
EmailTemplate.textOnly: To meet the continued demand for cash across Southeast Asia, you need an ATM fleet that’s built for a high volume of withdrawals and designed to meet consumers’ digital-first expectations. The NCR SelfServ 21 is the ATM of choice, giving you the exceptional consumer experience, high availability and enhanced security you need to extend your self-service channel across rural and urban areas. Get in touch to see how our SelfServ 21, digital-first software and high availability services can help you stand out in this competitive market. And what’s more, with NCR ATM as a Service we can bundle all this into one monthly fee. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
